author: "Fabricius, ab Aquapendente, approximately 1533-1619"
title: "Opera chirurgica ... in duas partes divisa. Quarum prior operationes chirurgicas per totum corpus humanum ... comprehendit ... Altera, libros quinque chirurgiae jam ante in Germania impressos & sub nomine Pentateuchi chirurgici divulgatos complectitur ..."
imprint: "Ludguni : Ex officina Joannis Pillehotte, sumpt. Joannis Caffin & F. Plaignard, 1628"
